description: From a series of five lithographs for Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse) by Leo Tolstoy, published by Karl Lang Verlag in Darmstadt, 1919; housed in a beige portfolio case with a gray binding; male figure tilted forward and dressed in black in lower left with hands in fists out in front of him; female figure tilted backwards and dressed in black behind him with long arms and open palms stretched in front of her and toward male figure
inscription: LRC in plate: P.W.G. /19 | LL in pencil, below image: 1) | LL of sheet, in pencil: Tolstoi: \"der lebende Leichnam\" / 5 Lithos. Sonderdrucke. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E 68-72 komplett-B
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse), Leo Tolstoy, published by Karl Lang Verlag in Darmstadt, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Fedja und Sascha, Plate 1 from Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse)
